The content of this application is for general information and use only.

Your access to this app is strictly depends on plan you choose. We reserve the right to delete or disable your account on expiration of duration of plan or in case non deposition of subscription fee.

We need your basic information for making this app accessible to you. If you provide any incorrect information, or we have reasonable grounds to suspect that such information is incorrect, we shall have the right to suspend or terminate your account on application and refuse to provide you access of app.

We take all necessary care to maintain safety of your personal information when you access our app.

Reproduction of contents of this app will be a criminal offence as per Copyright laws of country.

We take all reasonable care in ensuring that all information we provide in application is accurate but we are not responsible for any loss suffered by you as a consequence of any action you take or omit to take on basis of any of the information we provide .

Active internet connection will be required for using this application.

Although we will do our best to provide constant, uninterrupted access to the app, we do not guarantee this nor do we accept any responsibility or liability for any interruption or delay.

Your use of this app and any disputeÂ arising out of such use of the app is subject to the laws of India and to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Jind.
